Request - Class in app.Models
Represents a request in a sensor network, encapsulating the details needed to perform a query, including the client's connection info and the query code itself.
Request(QueryI, ConnectionInfoI) - Constructor for class app.Models.Request
Constructs a Request with specified query code and client connection information.
RequestContinuation - Class in app.Models
Extends the Request class to include handling of execution state, facilitating tracking and management of request processing within a sensor network.
RequestContinuation(QueryI, ConnectionInfoI, ExecutionStateI) - Constructor for class app.Models.RequestContinuation
Constructs a RequestContinuation with the specified query code, client connection info, and execution state.
requestURI() - Method in class app.Models.Request

resetNodesBlink() - Method in class app.gui.NetworkPanel
